properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Haistones up to 3 cm (based on photo). Peak time 0h10-0h20.
properties.REFERENCE: Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 1rst June 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Large hail up to at least 3.5 cm i.d. was reported. The time was based on radar data.
properties.REFERENCE: Eyewitness report via Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 31 MAY 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Large hail up to at least 3.5-4 cm i.d. was reported. The time was based on radar data.
properties.REFERENCE: Eyewitness report via Météo.02 (on Facebook), 01 JUN 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Large hail up to at least 3 cm i.d. was reported. Damage to tables and chairs occurred. The time was based on radar data.
properties.REFERENCE: Eyewitness report (on Facebook), 01 JUN 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: First hailfall in the late evening, and the second just after midnight (peak time 00h05-00h15). Hailstones diameter up to around 5 cm (based on photos). Cars impacted (""""voitures grêlées"""").
properties.REFERENCE: Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 1rst June 2025.  Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 1rst June 2025, comment Catherine Molin 01/06/2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Large hail up to at least 2.5 cm i.d. was reported. The time was based on radar data.
properties.REFERENCE: Eyewitness report via Info trafic RN31 entre Reims-Compiègne (on Facebook), 31 MAY 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Strong hailfall between 23h50-0h10/15. Hailstones diameter up to 4 cm (based on poster's report). Cars and roofs damaged. Roads clogged with falling branches.
properties.REFERENCE: Météo.02 (on Facebook), 1rst June 2025.

properties.CONTACT: Igor Laskowski (ESWD management) / VOP Nicolas Baluteau
properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: Large hail up to at least 3 cm i.d. was reported. The time was based on radar data.
properties.REFERENCE: Eyewitness report via Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 31 MAY 2025.  Eyewitness report via Météo Nord Parisien - Votre météo sur le nord de l'IDF et l'Oise (on Facebook), 31 MAY 2025.  Info Circulation / Radar 60 (on Facebook), 1 June 2025.

properties.EVENT_DESCRIPTION: An isolated cell formed south of Saint-Amand and reached the commune with intense rain and hailfall (peak time 12h20-12h55). Hailstones diameter 2-3 cm (based on poster's comment). First link photo located at St Georges de Mons/Les Ancizes (63).
properties.REFERENCE: Yo-Han (on Facebook), 31 May 2025.
